description: Single storey side/ rear extension; alteration of roof to raise ridge height; replacing existing flat roof dormer roof extension to rear; additional roof light to front roof slope; installation of one timber sash window to existing rear elevation at first floor level
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):

840-OS-001 - Location plan, 840-OS-002 - Block plan, 840-EX-100 - Existing site plan, 840-EX-110 - Existing ground floor plan, 840-EX-130 - Existing second floor plan, 840-EX-140 - Existing roof plan, 840-EX-150 - Existing outbuilding, 840-EX-160 - Existing outbuilding, 840-EX-200 - Existing front elevation, 840-EX-210 - Existing rear elevation, 840-EX-220 - Existing side elevation, 840-EX-300 - Existing section, 840-EX-310 - Existing section, 840-EX-320 - Existing section, 840-EX-330 - Existing section, 840-PL-100 - Proposed site plan, 840-PL-110 - Proposed ground floor plan, 840-PL-120 - Proposed first floor plan, 840-PL-130 - Proposed second floor plan, 840-PL-140 - Proposed roof plan, 840-PL-200 - Proposed front elevation, 840-PL-210 - Proposed rear elevation, 840-PL-220 - Proposed side elevation, 840-PL-300 - Proposed section, 840-PL-310 - Proposed section, 840-PL-320 - Proposed section, 840-PL-330 - Proposed section, 840-PH-001 - Photosheet 1, 840-PH-002 - Photosheet 2, 840-PH-003 - Photosheet 3, 840-PH-004 - Photosheet 4,
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the single storey projection shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
